snippet: Tripoli-based former rebels controlling a security compound fought with at least 24 fighters from Misurata who had come to free a group of prisoners, according to medics and former rebels.
abstract: Two fighters are killed in gun battle between two Libyan militias over release of prisoners from a security compound; Tripoli officials had set Dec 20 deadline for militias to return to their homes, but Misurata militia still holds vast arsenals of armament that are testing the ability of the transitional government to assert its authority.
lead_paragraph: Tripoli-based former rebels controlling a security compound fought with at least 24 fighters from Misurata who had come to free a group of prisoners, according to medics and former rebels.

headline.main: Libya: 2 Killed in Militia Gun Battle in Tripoli
headline.print_headline: Libya: 2 Killed in Militia Gun Battle in Tripoli
